text: Joshua virgin I'm the chief product
officer for upwind security generative
AI has been incredibly transformative in
the early days here in the technology
industry in terms of roll out and
nowhere is that more true than the cyber
security industry where we have to both
use generative AI responsibly with our
customers data and secure their
generative AI workloads the biggest
misconception about generative AI is
that it's truly conscious or sensient
it's incredibly powerful within the
limits of its programming but you need
human oversight to make sure you're not
passing along inaccurate but seemingly
confident data to your customers
security is always job zero I think for
any technology vendor but especially a
cyber security vendor and so the way to
balance speed and delivery and
operational excellence and Security is
to leverage something like Amazon
Bedrock which is what we're using for
our own generative AI findings inside
the upwind platform we also leverage
human review from our manage detection
and response team on top of that but
Amazon makes it possible to avoid all of
the heavy lifting with Amazon Bedrock so
that's how we get the speed while not
compromising at all on security AWS is
already an incredibly effective partner
with generative AI the biggest way they
do that is all of the Innovations some
of which were released here at reinvent
and also because they broach the subject
of generative AI security with the
public so we can partner along with them
and when we're talking to customers it's
not a foreign concept to them at that
point AWS helps upwind security be more
secure scalable and Innovative all at
the same time through the availability
of hundreds of managed services that
remove the undifferentiated heavy
lifting from ourselves and from the
customers that we support through AWS
managed Services we are able to deliver
the utmost data privacy and operational
efficiency and security all at the same
time
[Music]
